title: Block :: Header content with link list

sub_fields.label: Link text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank the page name will be used as the link text.

fields.label: Marketo embed form
fields.name: marketo_form
fields.instructions: The Marketo embed form will show in a modal when a user clicks a PDF download link. Once it's completed it'll initiate a file download.

fields.label: Vimeo video id
fields.name: vimeo_id
fields.instructions: Video field only accepts Vimeo video IDs not the full url. eg) a4a46004ca

fields.label: Contact Information
fields.message: Contact name, email and phone number will be displayed from the global Press Contact information

sub_fields.label: Do you want a gray background?
sub_fields.name: background_color

sub_fields.label: Contact Form
sub_fields.message: This form fields and options are changed globally under Flatiron -> Contact form

sub_fields.label: Contact Form
sub_fields.message: This form fields and options are changed globally under Flatiron -> Contact form

sub_fields.label: Do you want a gray background?
sub_fields.name: background_color

sub_fields.label: Contact Form
sub_fields.message: This form fields and options are changed globally under Flatiron -> Contact form

sub_fields.label: Do you want a gray background?
sub_fields.name: background_color

sub_fields.label: Contact Form
sub_fields.message: This form fields and options are changed globally under Flatiron -> Contact form

fields.label: Main menu item
fields.name: main_menu
fields.instructions: This will be a main menu link or mega menu item. Currently: Technology, Company and Publications

sub_fields.label: Menu URL
sub_fields.name: menu_url
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page if you want to directly link to a page instead of creating a Mega Menu

fields.label: Menu blocks
fields.name: menu_blocks
fields.instructions: You create Menu Blocks that will create the 3 columns that resides under the Main Menu item.

sub_fields.label: Page links list
sub_fields.name: page_links
sub_fields.instructions: Select sub pages you want to list in the menu block

sub_fields.label: Single page link text
sub_fields.name: single_page_link_text
sub_fields.instructions: A longer text description for a Single Page Link

sub_fields.label: Single page link
sub_fields.name: single_page_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you don't want a list of links you can add a single page link

fields.label: Description
fields.message: Google Analytics (GA) basic embed tracking code is include within the themes code using the supplied ID below. If you want to add more tracking options within GA you will need to add those embed code options under Settings > Insert Headers and Footers.

fields.label: Contact form
fields.message: The form options are under Flatiron > Contact form. Note that this form is also used across the site on other pages that has a contact form.

fields.label: Contact information
fields.message: This will show the email address and phone number in the global Press Contact Information

fields.label: Team Members
fields.message: Team members will load in their respected order.

fields.label: First Name
fields.name: first_name
fields.instructions: Include only the first name and/or middle name. Do not end with a trailing space.
